ygData.msgSnippet: I Liked it I dont consider it a nurf. Aarkon 27th level Necromancer Povar Server ... From: Fraal  To: EQ_Shaman@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I Liked it I dont consider it a nurf.

Aarkon
27th level Necromancer
Povar Server
-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Shaman@onelist.com <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>; EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 6:10 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] NURF


So no one had anything to say about the DOT nurf? I thought I would see tons of email. Maybe everyone is playing since the servers were down for so stinking long.

Anyway I like the way they did the DOT nurf, I usually finght in a group so it HELPED me cus DAM was increased if they run less then 18 seconds. :-)

I guess we shall see if this nurfs Kiteing . . .

-Fraal L19 Ogre Shaman
-Skel L22 Necro
-E'ci

(I have a vested interest in DOT's)

P.S. (L19 SHM spells are sweet!)
